dialog.line: Hello you two. You're not often together at playtime.
Miss, twins spend so much time together, you know....
What he means is, that he needs to get away sometimes so he realises what a fantastic sister I am.
Not.
I saw you both talking to Steve over there. He looked really fed up.
Promise you won't tell?
Of course not. I promise I will tell, if I think I need to.
Well, we're not saying then.
Come on Rachel, you know you want to.
Yeah but that's the trouble with adults. You want to just talk but you don't know if it's going to get all out of hand. Specially teachers.
So are there any adults it's okay to talk to?
Well I'm only kidding really, cos we will tell you won't we Luke? It's like, well, it's good to be able to say things without knowing for sure that it's going to get all official.
But sometimes it needs to. That's why teachers get all official, it's their job to look after you, and it's mine too.
Yeah, we know, but sometimes it's nice just to have an adult listen and not go rushing off trying to sort things out, d'you know what I mean?
So we can think about it and decide what we want to do.
Our cousin says the nurse at his school is like that.
And you are too Miss, a bit. No offence, but cos you're not like, y'know, a proper teacher.
So what's up with Steve then? And I promise I won't do anything without telling you, but I might not say what I'm going to do. Okay?
Okay. You know we got called lots of names last term cos people said we were fat and everything?
Yes, and then we got well annoyed when the government started saying fat people are a real problem. That made it worse.
Well you aren't overweight, I think we sorted that out didn't we, as well as something about name-calling. Steve's not either.
But he does have red hair, freckles, and thick glasses.
Right. So is he getting called names because of that?
Yeah, and it's horrible, he doesn't stand up for himself at all though you can see in his face he hates it. So she just does it more.
Who's she?
A girl on the bus we go home on sometimes. She's from the big school. Justine and Nadine sit with him when they're on the bus but she gives them a mouthful too.
